descriptionHtml:
This 1hand axe, kept by Charon to harvest souls of those damned, is kept where his Ferry is docked. Can you get the key from Charon and claim the axe your own. West of Morthal a cave leads to his port.

This is a 1hand version of Nicoroshi axe Charons Call from Oblivion.Credit for the axe goes to him, I just made 1handed ver. Axe is enchanted with soul trap and fire. Enjoy, BG.



DO NOT upload to other sites or use assets without permission, thanks BG
author: badgremlin
